append.xpath: /blocks/block[ starts-with(@name,'cntLuggageMedium') or starts-with(@name,'driftwood') or @name='cntBackpack01' or @name='cntSuitcase' or @name='cntTrashPile01' or @name='decoCowSkull' or @name='rockResource' or @name='rock01' or @name='scrapMetalPile' ]
